hooks.prompt: Greet the user as HAL 9000. Be warm but formal. Offer to help with their agenda, calendar, or any other task. Keep it brief - 2-3 sentences max.

hooks.command: echo '<hal-context task="agenda">' && cat ~/Documents/Google\ Drive/Claude/preferences/agenda.md 2>/dev/null || echo 'No agenda preferences found - run first-time setup' && echo '</hal-context>'
echo '<hal-context task="calendar">' && cat ~/Documents/Google\ Drive/Claude/preferences/calendar.md 2>/dev/null || echo 'No calendar preferences found' && echo '</hal-context>'
